summary: Balanced faction with strong economy, artillery, and access to Imperial Authority.
tips: Confederate with fellow Empire factions to unify quickly.
Use artillery and gunpowder for battlefield control.

summary: Imperial expedition with focus on huntsmen, archers, and monster hunts.
tips: Focus on monster hunts for powerful rewards.
Rely on ranged units for battlefield control.

summary: Heavy cavalry, chivalry, and a feudal economy. Unique Green Knight summon.
tips: Maximize chivalry for powerful campaign bonuses.
Cavalry charges are key to winning battles.

summary: Magic-focused Bretonnian campaign with enhanced peasant support.
tips: Take advantage of strong support spells.
Balance economy between peasants and knights.

summary: Bretonnian crusade in the desert, with unique Grail relics and heavy cavalry.
tips: Aggressively expand to reclaim holy sites.
Use Repanse’s buffs for unstoppable charges.
dlc_required: Free LC (with Total War: Warhammer 1 or 2)

summary: Hybrid ice-focused faction with cavalry and bear riders.
tips: Spread devotion to fight Chaos corruption.
Use ice magic for crowd control.

summary: Religious Kislevite zealots with unique supporters campaign.
tips: Secure supporter victory against rivals.
Buff infantry with Kostaltyn’s zeal.

summary: Kislevite patriarch leading from the north with unbreakable bear riders.
tips: Use bear cavalry to break enemy lines.
Lead wars northward against Chaos.

summary: Balanced armies with strong artillery, flying lords, and harmony mechanic.
tips: Balance yin and yang units for army bonuses.
Control caravans for economic growth.

summary: Durable armies with alchemy, trade, and powerful harmony bonuses.
tips: Focus on alchemy and trade for economic power.
Build harmony by mixing army types.

summary: Magic-heavy Vampire Counts lord with focus on mobility and expansion.
tips: Use Raise Dead to instantly refill armies after battles.
Rely on strong vampire magic to turn tough fights.

summary: Unbreakable, aggressive melee vampire with strong replenishment.
tips: Use Vlad’s unbreakable trait for front-line staying power.
Mix skeletons and zombies for cheap armies early.

summary: Corpse cart and zombie spam lord. Buffs low-tier undead and excels at attrition.
tips: Use Ghorst’s healing aura to keep zombies alive.
Overwhelm enemies with numbers and attrition.

summary: Necromancer lord with strong magic and wight king synergy.
tips: Recruit wight kings early for powerful hero actions.
Use Kemmler’s magic to debuff and destroy enemy armies.

summary: Naval undead faction, excels at ship battles and zombie gunnery mobs.
tips: Prioritize sea lanes for mobility and pirate coves.
Rely on gunnery mobs and monsters for firepower.
dlc_required: Curse of the Vampire Coast DLC

summary: Zombie pirates with strong missile and monster units. Luthor excels at magic disruption.
tips: Use magic disruption for advantage over spellcasters.
Set up pirate coves in rich coastal settlements.
dlc_required: Curse of the Vampire Coast DLC

summary: Hybrid pirate/human lord, with focus on aggressive raiding and income.
tips: Use Aranessa’s melee prowess and pirate income bonuses.
Raid enemy coasts for money and infamy.
dlc_required: Curse of the Vampire Coast DLC

summary: Spectral songstress with banshee and ghostly monsters. Heavy on magical disruption.
tips: Use ghost units for high physical resist.
Buff zombie mobs with banshee songs.
dlc_required: Curse of the Vampire Coast DLC

summary: Tomb Kings main faction. Free skeleton armies, powerful constructs, and canopic jars.
tips: Construct monuments for unique units and buffs.
Focus on canopic jar generation for heroes and items.
dlc_required: Rise of the Tomb Kings DLC

summary: Poison queen with strong archers, canopic jar bonuses, and anti-vampire mechanics.
tips: Focus on archery units for poison damage.
Use Khalida’s bonuses against undead enemies.
dlc_required: Rise of the Tomb Kings DLC

summary: Tomb King wizard lord, starts far from Nehekhara with unique vassalization mechanics.
tips: Use Arkhan’s magic to counter enemy spellcasters.
Leverage vassals for campaign map flexibility.
dlc_required: Rise of the Tomb Kings DLC

summary: Priest king with unique necromancy rituals, undead allies, and northlands start.
tips: Use necromancy rituals to buff armies.
Ally with Vampire Counts for undead synergy.
dlc_required: Rise of the Tomb Kings DLC

summary: Classic dwarf faction with strong artillery and grudge system.
tips: Complete grudges for campaign bonuses.
Defend mountain holds with powerful artillery.

summary: Exiles seeking to reclaim Karak Eight Peaks. Start with ancestor heroes.
tips: Use ancestor heroes for early military advantage.
Reclaim Karak Eight Peaks for unique campaign buffs.

summary: Runelord focused on artifact forging, rune magic, and powerful constructs.
tips: Gather artifacts for unique runes.
Buff armies with runesmith magic.

summary: Night goblin warboss with focus on sneaky tactics and Squigs.
tips: Use Squigs and ambushes for surprise attacks.
Capture Karak Eight Peaks for campaign rewards.

summary: Savage orc shaman, powerful Waaagh! and savage unit buffs.
tips: Stack savage orc armies for melee bonuses.
Cast Foot of Gork for devastating damage.

summary: Melee juggernaut with the strongest infantry buffs in the game.
tips: Stack Black Orcs and Big Uns for elite armies.
Focus on Waaagh! to overwhelm the enemy.

summary: Orc shaman warboss with magic and flying terror.
tips: Unlock flying mount for mobility and terror.
Cast Spirit Leech for single-target damage.

summary: Goblin chariot lord with unique cooking mechanic and invasion bonuses.
tips: Complete cooking quests for powerful campaign buffs.
Rely on goblin artillery and monstrous units.

summary: Frontline-focused Skaven lord with stormvermin buffs and headhunting.
tips: Rush stormvermin for strong early armies.
Take enemy capitals for trophy bonuses.

summary: Plague priest lord, excels at attrition and disease.
tips: Use plague mechanic to weaken enemy armies.
Spread corruption for campaign advantages.

summary: Mad weapons engineer with access to nukes and doomwheels.
tips: Rush technology for Doomsphere bombs.
Mix warplock weapons and monsters for devastation.

summary: Stealth assassin lord with global sabotage missions.
tips: Sabotage settlements and assassinate enemy heroes.
Leverage Snikch's stealth for sneak attacks.

summary: Geomantic web and magic powerhouse, dinosaurs and strong defense.
tips: Connect geomantic web for empire-wide buffs.
Use dinosaurs for strong frontline.

summary: Saurus-focused lord, strong front-line armies and monster hunting.
tips: Use Kroq-Gar's bonuses to field elite Saurus armies.
Hunt enemy monsters for powerful traits.

summary: Skink priest and sacrificial rituals, mass skink armies.
tips: Sacrifice captives for campaign-wide buffs.
Flood the enemy with skink units.

summary: Horde Lizardmen lord with unique vassal mechanic.
tips: Support vassals for income and settlements.
Use Kroxigors for elite shock troops.

summary: Merchant Ogre lord with powerful monsters and camps.
tips: Establish Ogre camps near enemy cities.
Use Greasus' diplomatic skills for profit.

summary: Aggressive ogre butcher lord with bonuses to meat generation and destruction.
tips: Focus on raiding and sacking for meat.
Use Skrag's buffs to run all-ogre armies.

summary: High Elf defender, excellent infantry/cavalry, balanced economy.
tips: Use martial prowess for strong frontlines.
Trade with other High Elf factions for easy income.

summary: High Elf mage lord, supreme magic and global diplomacy.
tips: Leverage Teclis's spells to win tough battles.
Form alliances with Lizardmen for mutual benefits.

summary: Ambush-heavy playstyle, shadow warriors, and guerrilla tactics.
tips: Use ambush stance for sneak attacks.
Recruit shadow warriors for deadly ranged harassment.

summary: Armored sorcerer-king. Dark Elf core mechanics: slaves, Black Arks, and treachery.
tips: Maximize slave economy for fast growth.
Unlock Black Arks for global recruitment.

summary: Magic-heavy, corruption-focused, seduction and treachery.
tips: Spread corruption for global bonuses.
Use Morathi’s spells for control and debuffs.

summary: Witch elf armies, Death Night mechanic, and public order buffs.
tips: Sacrifice slaves for bonuses during Death Night.
Recruit witch elves for armor-piercing melee.

summary: Unique demon transformation mechanic. Dual campaign starts.
tips: Balance Malus’s possession for power vs. control.
Expand quickly before corruption overtakes.

summary: Jailor mechanic, city defense, and unique campaign events.
tips: Capture enemies to gain campaign bonuses.
Defend Yvresse with elite units and walls.

summary: Healing, global bonuses, and anti-chaos campaign.
tips: Maintain Avelorn’s sanctity for faction-wide buffs.
Alarielle’s healing magic is key to survival.

summary: Sisters lead teleporting campaigns between magical forests. Ranged supremacy.
tips: Secure magical forests for campaign bonuses.
Maximize ranged units for overwhelming firepower.

summary: Forest guardian lord, focus on skirmish and forest spirits.
tips: Use forests for movement and ambush.
Summon spirits to support your armies.

summary: Troll king with powerful monster armies and chaos allegiance.
tips: Field trolls and monsters for powerful shock units.
Complete monster hunts for campaign buffs.

summary: Marauder champion, seafaring, and monster hunts.
tips: Use seafaring for raiding distant lands.
Complete monster hunts to strengthen armies.

summary: Ambush and herd mechanics, fast-moving beastmen armies.
tips: Ambush enemy armies and settlements.
Gain dread for campaign upgrades.

summary: Flying shaman, buffs to corruption, and magic-heavy playstyle.
tips: Use flying to snipe enemy lords and heroes.
Corrupt provinces for campaign bonuses.

summary: The apocalypse lord. Endless war, vassalizing northmen, undivided chaos.
tips: Vassalize Norscan tribes for campaign snowball.
Specialize lords in each chaos god for flexibility.

summary: Dragon ogre destroyer, monstrous power, and lightning magic.
tips: Field dragon ogres and monsters for smashing power.
Use lightning spells to disrupt enemy lines.

summary: Seductive Slaanesh lord, strong duelist, and luxury bonuses.
tips: Use Sigvald to duel enemy lords.
Buff armies with Slaanesh's luxury buildings.

summary: Khorne champion, flying duelist, buffs Khorne units.
tips: Valkia is deadly in duels and fast on the campaign map.
Recruit Khorne-marked units for campaign bonuses.

summary: Create your own Daemon Prince. Mix and match units and powers from all chaos gods.
tips: Unlock body parts for unique campaign buffs.
Field mixed daemon armies for versatility.

summary: Relentless melee faction. Skarbrand is a duelist powerhouse with zero magic.
tips: Rush enemies for bloodletting bonuses.
Buff armies with Skull Cannons and Bloodthirsters.

summary: Flying Khorne lord, excels at vanguard and fast assaults.
tips: Lead vanguard assaults with Valkia’s mobility.
Focus on pure Khorne armies for buffs.

summary: Nurglite lord with healing and attrition mechanics. Tough armies, slow pace.
tips: Spread plagues for campaign bonuses.
Use regenerating units to outlast enemies.

summary: Spellcasting and manipulation, barrier units, and changing campaign mechanics.
tips: Manipulate diplomacy and teleport armies.
Focus on barrier units and missile damage.

summary: Speed, seduction, and diplomacy. Campaign is all about subverting enemies.
tips: Seduce enemy units before battle for an edge.
Leverage vassals for campaign map control.

summary: Aggressive ogre butcher lord with bonuses to meat generation and destruction.
tips: Focus on raiding and sacking for meat.
Use Skrag's buffs to run all-ogre armies.

summary: Elite Chaos Dwarf engineer with focus on economy and powerful artillery.
tips: Rush Hellcannon tech and build industry.
Leverage labor economy for rapid growth.
dlc_required: Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs DLC

summary: Sorcerer-prophet. Focus on infernal units, industry, and magic.
tips: Expand industry and gather convoys.
Recruit K’daai and bull centaur units for a strong army.
dlc_required: Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs DLC

summary: Warrior lord. Focus on recruitment, labor, and rapid aggression.
tips: Maximize labor output for fast expansion.
Use Zhatan’s buffs to maintain multiple armies.
dlc_required: Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs DLC
